titles.title: Recognizing the contributions of African Americans to the musical heritage of the United States and the need for greater access to music education for African-American students and supporting the designation of June 2023 as African-American Music Appreciation Month.

Recognizing the contributions of African Americans to the musical heritage of the United States and the need for greater access to music education for African-American students and supporting the designation of June 2023 as African-American Music Appreciation Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of African American Music Appreciation Month and recognizes the contributions of African Americans to the musical heritage of the United States.
